name: Fallen Bird
description:
A fallen bird from the nest.
Could the bird go back to the nest?

Tweeeeeeeeeeet~~

What is this?
Fallen Bird is platformer game.
You can feel challenges and achievements in this game.
You need micro control and there are puzzles and moving objects in the level.
I do not know if it feels a bit difficult.
It is your choice whether you send the bird back to the nest or not.
Good luck to you.

- Opening and ending cuts
- 12 Hidden achievements
- Record competition
